params.lp: The address of the registered Chromatic LP.
params.market: The address of the associated market.

params.lp: The address of the unregistered Chromatic LP.
params.market: The address of the associated market.

returns.lpAddresses: An array of Chromatic LP addresses.

params.market: The address of the market for which LPs are to be retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Chromatic LP addresses associated with the specified market.

params.token: The address of the settlement token for which LPs are to be retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Chromatic LP addresses associated with the specified settlement token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.lp: The address of the Chromatic LP contract to be registered.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.lp: The address of the Chromatic LP contract to be unregistered.

AlreadyRegistered().notice: Error thrown when attempting to register an LP that is already registered.

NotRegistered().notice: Error thrown when attempting to unregister an LP that is not registered.

OnlyAccessableByOwner().notice: Error thrown when a function is called by an unauthorized user.

ChromaticLPRegistered(address,address).notice: Emitted when a Chromatic LP is successfully registered.

ChromaticLPUnregistered(address,address).notice: Emitted when a Chromatic LP is successfully unregistered.

lpList().notice: Retrieves the list of all registered Chromatic LP addresses.

lpListByMarket(address).notice: Retrieves the list of Chromatic LP addresses associated with a specific market.

lpListBySettlementToken(address).notice: Retrieves the list of Chromatic LP addresses associated with a specific settlement token.
